name: Cannon Flight
summary:
A cannon. A wing-suit. And you. Always wanted to fly like a bird? With Cannon Flight, you can experience an explosive adventure with Ed Euromaus and his friends… at dizzying heights!

A cannon fires you into the air, where you will be challenged to use jump pads, trampolines and your wing-suit to prove your flying skills. Do you have what it takes to perform risky maneuvers in the air? Collect letters and coins to unlock new levels and playable characters with unique abilities!
